> <OLD - WHEELIE>
>
> There was a careful pause from WHEELIE as he nodded over at Astra and
> Firehorn, and then he spoke simply, "Until the day we meet again, I hope
> that this is not the end."
>
> At this point, recognizing the solemnity of the room, WHEELIE depowered his
> weapon and went to sheathe it.  Even if this group would end being
> adversaries, he wuold not instigate a conflict with them or endanger what
> they ahd built here, whatever it was with things he did not recognize,
> beyond even what he had seen of the Quintessons and of Unicron in his own
> way.
>
> Giving them an example of a Cybertronian salute, not specific to any
> faction, Wheelie quietly went in over to the central chamber.

> <OLD>

The figure in the throne stood and returned the salute, although it
was a little uncertainly, as if he was unused to utilizing such a form
of address. He nodded as WHEELIE stepped foward. "Greeings." he said,
his voice deep and powerful.

> <OLD - WHEELIE>
>
> OOC - Must..  Resist..  Urge..  To abuse fact only thing that rhymes wtih
> Unus is Anus..

OOC: LOL!

> <OLD>
>
> WHEELIE entered ni, glancing about the chamber, not quite reverently, but
> curiously, "What are you?  Where did you come from, what do you do?"  Seeing
> if eh could get any sort of ifnormation on what this mysterious base was
> for.

<NEW>

There was a regal nod from UNUS, "ahh, you are like the other." he
said peering at WHEELIE's Autobot brand. "He told me that others might
come, but he described a different sort of symbol."

UNUS gestured towards WHEELIE, "You must be tired after your travels,
sit, sit."

A chair was brought for WHEELIE as ASTRA and FIREHORN moved to stand
nearer UNUS moving ao a position of attention and then 'at-ease', the
but of their axes resting comfortably on the ground, held calmly in
the left hands, they stood like soldiers.

"You have many questions." UNUS said with a smile, "But I don't think
my answers will help you much." He seated himself back in his seat,
even this movement somehow regal and dignified. "Perhaps the what we
are is a little easier. We are the Cornu." As he said this he gestured
to the other figures that stood around the room."

He peered closely at WHEELIE again, "From what we have learned we are
not much different then you I would think. Our structure seems to be
largely the same, although we turn into animals while seem to turn
into a strange wheeled vehicle." There was a dismissive gesture, "But
I think underneath we all about the same."

UNUS paused, "Now as to where we came from, now that is a little more
involved." he smiled again as if realizing something, "You could think
of us as experiments, as Rattlings that have escaped their cages."

There was a general chuckle around the room, most of them seemingly
aware of what he meant.

"We have forged ourselves a home and we live nestled in the very
shadow of our ex-creators." There was small smile from UNUS, one of
pride and humor.

(TAG)

Preston
